MainMenu Controls:
Space_bar key: Starts the Game
C key: Changes Ship color
M key: Toggle Music Settings
D key: change the difficulty of the game

In-Game Controls:

Left-arrow key: move left
Right-arrow key: move right
Space_bar key: shoot
P key: pause game


Pause Controls:

P key: unpause Game
return key: exit game
esc key: return to main menu

End-Game Controls:

Space_bar key: restarts the game
esc key: return to main menu
return key: exit game
